statements: SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT investment_type FROM Investment_Portfolios;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT portfolio_id, client_id, investment_name FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE client_id = 123 AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE client_id = 456 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT investment_type FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE client_id = 789;
SELECT client_id, investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY client_id, investment_amount;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolios WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM client_investment_portfolio;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM client_investment_portfolio WHERE investment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM client_info WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM client_investment_portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, investment_id, investment_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM client_investment_portfolio WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT client_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM client_info INNER JOIN client_investment_portfolio ON client_info.client_id = client_investment_portfolio.client_id WHERE client_info.client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM client_info WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 1000);
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM client_info WHERE client_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment_amount FROM client_investment_portfolio WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, email FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_id, stock_symbol, quantity, price FROM investments WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, name, email FROM clients WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT clients.name, investments.stock_symbol, investments.quantity FROM clients JOIN portfolios ON clients.client_id = portfolios.client_id JOIN investments ON portfolios.portfolio_id = investments.portfolio_id;

SELECT clients.name, SUM(investments.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM clients JOIN portfolios ON clients.client_id = portfolios.client_id JOIN investments ON portfolios.portfolio_id = investments.portfolio_id GROUP BY clients.name;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients;
SELECT symbol, quantity, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT client_id, amount FROM portfolios ORDER By amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios p INNER JOIN clients c ON p.client_id = c.client_id WHERE c.client_name = 'Alice' AND p.amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM holdings ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT client_name, transaction_amount FROM clients INNER JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30 AND client_age < 50;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM holdings GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT client_name, investment_name, transaction_type FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Real Estate' AND investment_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY investment_id ASC;
